Posts.EditableText:
I finally finished my game! It's here:

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/rCbeopvgA0mTWhRASVYi7Q/escape-from-the-mechanical-bathhouse

...it's not going to win a Pulitzer, but it was fun to make and I learnt a lot along the way with the aid of super-helpful forum people. Thanks everyone!
